products.name: Clay Midas Wolf Ashe Skirt
products.brandedName: Greyson Clay Midas Wolf Ashe Skirt
products.description: Founded in 2015, Greyson Clothiers was born from the vision of uniting fashion and sport. By crafting products that can perform at the highest level through superior tailoring and construction, Greyson has shown that sport, tailored fashion, and functionality can coexist. Crafted from a luxurious fabric and featuring a pleated design, the Ashe Skirt is a quintessential piece that can move beyond the court. Designed with plenty of stretch so you can move freely through the day, and finished with an internal shortie and pockets at the hips to store tennis balls and other valuables. Pair with a cream cardigan for grabbing coffee, or with the matching Clay Sleeveless Halley Quarter Zip for a morning on the courts. Elastic waist Pleating throughout Interior shorts Side pockets at hips Mini length Material: 86% Polyester, 14% Spandex Care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low
